title: Ghosts, Gunman and the Grinning Cat
description: When Danielle Jacobs inherited the Manchester Hotel, she thought it would be her chance for a new life, away from the violence of her past.Then strange things started happening at the haunted hotel. Somebody was trying to kill her, but who and why?Eli Garrison, booked a room at the hotel wanting nothing more than to finish his book and get the hell out of hick-town. Suddenly he found himself only wanting to protect the stubborn, but sexy, hotel owner.Danielle didn't know who was a bigger threat, the person determined to kill her or the ex-cop who wouldn't let her out of his sight. Her hard-won independence was at stake. Was she willing to give it up because of one man?
author: Malynda McCarrick
